name: Shoottera
description: Shooter with the elements of the quest. You need to get out of the lab, killing all the enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: Intel atom 1.2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 7 8 8.1 10 Processor: 2.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Better then Intel HD Graphics Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Any
